title: Statement by Press Secretary Robert Gibbs, 5-29-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 29, 2009

 



Statement by Press Secretary Robert Gibbs, 5-29-09




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of the Press Secretary   ______________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                   May 29, 2009  STATEMENT BY PRESS SECRETARY ROBERT GIBBS    The United States strongly condemns the recent terrorist attacks inside Iran. The American people send their deepest condolences to the victims and their families. No cause justifies terrorism, and the United States condemns it in any form, in any country, against any people.
